author: Kaiden Smith
title: Stanford transfer running back EJ Smith, son of Emmitt Smith, commits to Texas A&M - On3
text: Stanford transfer running back EJ Smith, son of Emmitt Smith, commits to Texas A&M Former Stanford running back EJ Smith has committed to Texas A&M after entering the transfer portal earlier this offseason, per an announcement from a post on his Instagram account . To keep up with the latest players on the move, check out On3’s Transfer Portal wire . Track transfer portal activity As of January 7th, 2,223 FBS players have entered the Transfer Portal. While the NCAA Transfer Portal database is private, the On3 Network has streamlined the reporting process tracking player movement. If you find yourself asking, ‘How can I track transfer portal activity?’ our well-established network of reporters and contacts across college athletics keeps you up to speed in several ways, from articles written about players as they enter and exit the transfer portal or find their new destination, to our social media channels, to the On3 https://www.on3.com/transfer-portal/wire/football/2024/. The transfer portal wire provides a real-time feed of player activity, including basic player profile information, transfer portal ranking and original On3 Industry recruiting ranking , as well as NIL valuation (name, image and likeness). The On3 Transfer Portal Rankings allow for you to filter the On3 Industry Rankings to find the best of the best in the portal, starting with Overall Top Players . You can dive deeper into the rankings and filter by position whether it is Quarterback , Running Back , Wide Receiver , Tight End , Offensive Tackle , Interior Offensive Line , Edge , Defensive Line , Linebacker , Cornerback , Safety , Athlete , Kicker , Punter , or Long Snapper you’re looking for. The On3 Transfer Portal Instagram account and Twitter account are excellent resources to stay up to date with the latest moves.
